00055 #ifndef INDRI_JELINEKMERCERTERMSCOREFUNCTION_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_JELINEKMERCERTERMSCOREFUNCTION_HPP
00057 
00058 #include <math.h>
00059 
00060 class JelinekMercerTermScoreFunction : public TermScoreFunction {
00061 private:
00062   double _lambda;
00063   double _backgroundLambda;
00064   double _collectionFrequency;
00065   double _collectionComponent;
00066   double _oneLevelCollectionComponent;
00067   double _contextLambda;
00068   double _collectionLambda;
00069   double _documentLambda;
00070   double _foregroundLambda;
00071 
00072 public:
00073   JelinekMercerTermScoreFunction( double collectionFrequency, double collectionLambda, double documentLambda = 0.0 ) {
00074     _contextLambda = (1 - collectionLambda - documentLambda);
00075     _collectionFrequency = collectionFrequency;
00076     _collectionLambda = collectionLambda;
00077     _documentLambda = documentLambda;
00078     _foregroundLambda = _collectionLambda + _documentLambda;
00079 
00080     assert( _documentLambda >= 0.0 && _documentLambda <= 1.0 );
00081     assert( _collectionLambda >= 0.0 && _collectionLambda <= 1.0 );
00082     assert( _contextLambda >= 0.0 && _contextLambda <= 1.0 );
00083     
00084     _collectionComponent = _collectionLambda * _collectionFrequency;
00085   }
00086 
00087   double scoreOccurrence( int occurrences, int contextSize ) {
00088     //
00089     //             [                      occurrences                                             ]
00090     // score = log [ foregroundLambda * ---------------  + collectionLambda * collectionFrequency ]
00091     //             [                      contextSize                                             ]
00092     //
00093 
00094     double contextFrequency = contextSize ? double(occurrences) / double(contextSize) : 0.0;
00095     return log( _foregroundLambda * contextFrequency + _collectionComponent );
00096   }
00097 
00098   double scoreOccurrence( int occurrences, int contextSize, int documentOccurrences, int documentLength ) {
00099     double contextFrequency = contextSize ? double(occurrences) / double(contextSize) : 0.0;
00100     double documentFrequency = documentLength ? double(documentOccurrences) / double(documentLength) : 0.0;
00101     return log( _contextLambda * contextFrequency + _documentLambda * documentFrequency + _collectionComponent );
00102   }
00103 };
00104 
00105 #endif // INDRI_JELINEKMERCERTERMSCOREFUNCTION_HPP
